v.desc: Link to HTML with Azure Marketplace terms.
Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.desc: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.desc: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.desc: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

lastModifiedBy.desc: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.desc: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

ov.desc: List of inner error messages indicating why the operation failed.

message.desc: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
